title: B&P Announces IdPure Special Type Issue
content:
Submitted by [Miss Tiffany](http://web.archive.org/web/20080320020424/http:/typophile.com/user/108 "View user profile.") : 17.Jan.2008 11.15am 

B&P is proud to present the new annual IdPure Special Type Issue. This  
year, IdPure asked B&P to conceive, direct and design it. The IdPure  
Special Type Issue 07 features exclusive interviews with: Nikola Djurek,  
Kai Bernau, Anton Koovit, Pascal Zoghbi, Christian Schwartz, Frederik  
Berlaen, Xavier Dupr√©. It also features special reports on the teaching  
of contemporary typedesign in switzerland (ECAL, HGKZ), all this  
punctuated by stunning photographs of the swiss mountains by Tonatuh  
Abrosetti.

For more informations, please visit the B&P Typefoundry website's  
"Publications" section: http://www.bpfoundry.com/
author: Miss Tiffany
